subject: Please help my vam modules have stopped working
description_text:
Hi
I purchased 3 VAM modules from you a couple of weeks ago, they worked intermittently for a while, now they are not working at all.
I have tried re-installing the software and the simhub beta that you said use but still nothing.
Can you help troubleshoot please?
Regards Andrew Lawrence

conversations.body_text: Hi Andy Lawrence,  Please update to SIMSONN Manager version 2.0.9 and SIMHUB version 9.9.3. After updating, test whether the motor operates normally. If it is confirmed that the motor was damaged due to excessive vibration intensity, we will send you a free replacement. Kindly provide your order number and shipping address so we can arrange the replacement promptly. Note: Version 2.0.9 will automatically limit the maximum vibration strength of VAM motors to 30% or 50%, to prevent damage caused by overly aggressive settings.

Hi
I have done as you asked and updated both simhub and the simsonn software but the modules are still not working, the simsonn software is registering that the modules are connected via USB but the power is disconnected. My original order number is SSN#1693.If they the 3 modules are deemed faulty can you please send 3 more, thank you.
Andrew Lawrence

Hi Andy Lawrence,     It's understandable that the motor might be damaged, but please try unplugging all three motors, then reconnect the USB and plug in the DC power supply again. Does the software indicate that the power is connected? If it shows that the power is disconnected, try unplugging and reconnecting both the USB and the power. If the power connection still doesn't show up after multiple attempts, then the control box may be faulty.

Hi
I have tried to disconnect and reconnect everything but it didn't change the function at all.This is what the simsonn software is showing when everything is connected and turned on.


Regards

Hi Andy Lawrence,    Please take a photo showing how the DC power supply is connected to the control box so I can check it. Also, please confirm whether the green indicator light on the power supply is on.
Sent from Yahoo Mail for iPhone

Please find attached the photo you requested.

Thanks

Hello

Regards Andrew Lawrence

Hi Andy Lawrence,     Please uninstall the old version on your computer, then reinstall version 2.1.2 and update the firmware. After the update, the device version should display as CPU1: 2.0.5, CPU2: 2.0.3.
